item.description:
The monthly games night continues! Please note, I've changed this to a Monday this month!

Games to be played will be decided on the day of, however, I have:


  • 1 deck of playing cards (michigan rummy, poker, 500, etc.)
  • Double Uno deck
  • Fluxx
  • Chrononauts
  • Scrabble
  • Collection of strategy games
  • Killer Bunnies
  • Cranium


If you have a favorite game that you'd like to play, feel free to bring it and teach everyone!

Games to begin as soon as enough people show up. I'll have some snacks available, as well as some soda and a adult beverages.

Evening will run from 6:30 to 10ish.
item.how_to_find_us: Call me when you get to my building and someone will let you in.
item.name: Games Night
